feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.13: Rescue Safeties, Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Rescue from ActionController::ParameterMissing (#2138) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.6 to 0.5.7 (#2139) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump regexp_parser from 2.9.1 to 2.9.2 (#2149) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest from 5.22.3 to 5.23.0 (#2148) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.196.0 to 3.196.1 (#2147) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard-performance from 1.3.1 to 1.4.0 (#2143) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.35.1 to 1.36.0 (#2144) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.150.0 to 1.151.0 (#2142) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump zeitwerk from 2.6.13 to 2.6.14 (#2141) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.149.1 to 1.150.0 (#2137) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.80.0 to 1.81.0 (#2135) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-core from 0.14.1 to 0.15.0 (#2134) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.195.0 to 3.196.0 (#2133) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.16.4 to 1.16.5 (#2132) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump i18n-tasks from 1.0.13 to 1.0.14 (#2127) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump regexp_parser from 2.9.0 to 2.9.1 (#2131) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.194.2 to 3.195.0 (#2129) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.5 to 0.5.6 (#2128) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.925.0 to 1.926.0 (#2126) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.0.10 to 3.0.11 (#2125) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.40.13

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.1: The War Against the Bots
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

The new user sign up confirmation process now requires a click through. This is done so that URL scanners don't inadvertently confirm accounts.

Also now included is an example setup of running Password Pusher with Caddy for simple SSL hosting.

:rocket: Features

  • User Confirmation: Add click-through step (#2199) @pglombardo
  • Latest Language Strings (#2200) @pglombardo
  • Launch Password Pusher with Let's Encrypt SSL/TLS Certificates (#2192) @pglombardo
  • Caddy: Add Secure Cookies Policy (#2201) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.11 to 0.4.12 (#2194) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-storage from 1.51.0 to 1.52.0 (#2197) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump ffi from 1.16.3 to 1.17.0 (#2196) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump mini_portile2 from 2.8.6 to 2.8.7 (#2195) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.38.0 to 0.39.0 (#2193) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush
